*** Settings ***
Library           String

*** Test Cases ***
Convert To Uppercase string
    ${result}=    Convert To Uppercase    abcd
    Should be Equal    ${result}    ABCD

Convert To Uppercase numbers
    ${result}=    Convert To Uppercase    1234
    Should be Equal    ${result}    1234

Convert To Uppercase mixed
    ${result}=    Convert To Uppercase    a1b2C3d4e
    Should be Equal    ${result}    A1B2C3D4E

Convert To Lowercase string
    ${result}=    Convert To Lowercase    ABCD
    Should be Equal    ${result}    abcd

Convert To Lowercase numbers
    ${result}=    Convert To Lowercase    1234
    Should be Equal    ${result}    1234

Convert To Lowercase mixed
    ${result}=    Convert To Lowercase    A1B2c3D4E
    Should be Equal    ${result}    a1b2c3d4e
